title: Are sulphur emissions from Wuhan, China, a point to burning mass for victims of the Corona virus?
subtitle: The data map that appeared on a famous Twitter thread did not show what some people claimed.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Satellite data show a significant amount of sulphur dioxide from the suburbs of Wuhan, China, and can be seen as evidence of the mass burning of new victims of the koruna virus.
